An extension that improves the Amazon Mechanical Turk (MTurk) website.

Tracker Truk is a an extension that brings together a large collection of useful tools to assist workers on Amazon Mechanical Turk.

Privacy Policy: https://vpnorca.biz/privacy.html



MTurk
- Total Account listing
- daily work flows
- daily transfer
- Reports
- Team management
- maintain branch
